description: Non-Material Amendment to the time triggers of conditions 4 (Detailed Drawings), 9 (Highgate Wood Boundary Treatment), 11 (Detailed Design of New Wall / Parapet Fronting Muswell Hill Road), 20a (Energy Strategy), 28a (Design Stage Passivhaus Strategy for Blocks A1 and A2) and 29a (Design Stage Passivhaus Strategy for Blocks B and C) of planning permission ref. HGY/2021/2727 granted on 10/10/2022 for the demolition of existing building and redevelopment of site to provide 41 new homes within 3 buildings ranging from 3 to 6 storeys in height, with associated vehicular access from Woodside Avenue, wheelchair parking, landscaping, refuse/recycling and cycle storage facilities. New stepped access to Parkland Walk from Woodside Avenue.
site_name: Cranwood Development Site, 100 Woodside Avenue, Hornsey, London, N10 3JA
